function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of cross-system interoperability in healthcare","Impact":"Delay in COVID-19 response and potential loss of lives","Mitigation":"Implement interoperable systems and data sharing protocols","Technologies":"Health information exchange (HIE), FHIR standards for data exchange","People":"Healthcare providers, government bodies","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government bodies"},{"Description":"Inadequate data exchange due to legal issues, limited financial support, and international communication challenges","Impact":"Hampered response to COVID-19 and ineffective data consolidation","Mitigation":"Facilitate legal frameworks for data exchange, increase financial support, improve international communication channels","Technologies":"Integrated platform models, open-source structures for data sharing","People":"Governments, public health agencies, private organizations","Owner":"Governments, international organizations"},{"Description":"Poor quality and incomplete healthcare data impacting response to pandemic","Impact":"Development of inaccurate predictive models and hindrance in effective policy decision-making","Mitigation":"Implement data quality assurance mechanisms, standardize data formats, ensure reliability of data sources","Technologies":"Data quality assessment tools, data standardization technologies","People":"Healthcare providers, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, research communities"}]}
